predicate.note: Frames file for 'swap' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 13.6, no other framed members listed. Framenet entry Replacement. Comparison with exchange.

role.descr: other item in exchange, price, or premium, traded for or at

example.name: most typical usage
example.text: The bank has a 45% reserve against the remaining C$349 million of Mexican debt and expects *trace* to swap that for other Mexican notes supported by U.S. Treasury zero-coupon bonds.
example.arg: other Mexican notes supported by U.S. Treasury zero-coupon bonds

example.name: with another exchanger
example.text: Mary swapped germs with John last night.
